FOUND IN: Calorie per gram (cal/g) - The amount of energy produced when burning a single gram of a substance in calories.
Tachometer - Measures the engine's RPM (revolutions per minute).
Act - To perform in front of an audience, typically as part of a play or movie production.
Accord - An agreement or harmonious relation between people or groups.
Selkie (mythological sea creatures in Scots folklore, believed to be shapeshifters between humans and seals)
Ming Dynasty (Jiajing Emperor) - An era known for its rich cultural heritage and might be interpreted as a dynasty worth opposing Flash Gordon.
Namibia - Official name for South West Africa, a country located in Southern Africa.
